body:
I received a response from Azure support. I am using client certificate authentication and it looks to be an issue there with requests above a certain size (around 100KB)

From support:

To confirm, this issue occurs with client authentication turned on? If so this is currently a known issue. The current workaround is to either establish a connection with a smaller payload or use the existing connection to post the new payload.
title: Timeout POSTing 100ish KB to Azure app service MVC
